column4: Hey, could anyone with the knowledge of ubuntu installation open a private chat with me, I am having a resolution error and it wont let me install.
ishock i sent to a chat invite

I just had this problem last night, your best bet is to hit Ctrl+ALT+F1 when your moniter says "cannot disply...", then in the terminal type sudo nano /etc/x11/xorg.conf  then just hit enter/follow prompt unitl you get to resolution screen.  The just hit enter to enable/disbale a resolution
Thanks for the help, im going to try it out and see if it will let me install
np, if not try the second option "Run in safe graphics mode"
